_sText:
This map is based on the movie Indiana Jones, specifically the one where Indiana Jones is chased by a boulder in a cave. It has in total 14 traps, so it's not too easy, but not too hard.

Two of the traps are automatic, the moving walls at the start and the spinning platforms about 3/4 of the way through, so have fun! At the end, you now get a hat with your shotgun, so you can feel and look like Indie himself!

Thanks for downloading!

~ Sneeza
